title: Sachin Bansal-led Navi Tech files papers for Rs 3,350-crore public offer - Moneycontrol
content: Sachin Bansal-led Navi Tech files papers for Rs 3,350-crore public offer  Moneycontrol
description: Navi has opted for the inorganic route in the past to enter segments and its businesses include lending, general insurance, mutual funds, and microfinance. The firm is awaiting approval from the RBI for a universal banking licence to build a bank from the ground up, utilising the technology stack built in-house. It also has a stockbroking licence from Sebi.
